author: kkolinko
msg: Use UTF-8 for javadoc like in the main Tomcat build.xml - port of r1634105

author: kkolinko
msg: Align javadoc generation options for javadoc task of jdbc-pool with main Tomcat.
Suppress timestamp comment in generated Javadoc (see r1633500).

author: kkolinko
msg: Fix standalone javadoc generation in jdbc-pool using "javadoc" task in build.xml of jdbc-pool.
I doubt anyone uses it. Usually javadocs for the pool are generated from Tomcat-wide <javadoc> task in Tomcat's main build.xml file.
There is a trick: jdbc-pool.xml is transformed into package.html file.
Javadoc tool cannot parse the generated package.html if the page has complex headers, footers, HTML comments.
